    Executes the pawn jump move, updating the board accordingly.

    Move.PawnPromotion.execute()

    EvaluationCache.probe(Board board, int depth)

    private double
    AlphaBeta.quiescenceSearch(Board board, double alpha, double beta, int ply, boolean maximizing)
    Implements quiescence search to handle tactical sequences involving captures and checks to avoid the horizon effect in evaluation.
    private void
    AlphaBeta.recordCounterMove(Board board, Move move)
    Records a move as a countermove response to the last opponent move for move ordering.
    private double
    EndgameBoardEvaluator.rookEndgameEvaluation(Player player, Board board)
    Evaluates rook-specific endgame patterns, including rook activity on open files, rook placement behind passed pawns, and rook coordination.
    private double

    Searches the first move at the root using the Young Brothers Wait protocol to ensure the most promising move is fully explored before other threads begin.
